#  configure

Configure your CLI

## Synopsis

Configure your CLI

```
GoJelastic configure [flags]
```

## Examples

```
GoJelastic configure --token=token --url=url
```

## Options

```
  -h, --help           help for configure
      --token string   Your Jelastic token
      --url string     Your Jelastic url
```
